name: TamagotchIT
description:
TamagotchIT is an endless reflex game. Your beloved  Pennywise the Clown will ask you for his balloon,  a kid or even his favourite sewer, so make sure you give him what he asks for!

How To Play:

When you see the cloud above Pennywise's head, click the correct button. That's all!

A game made for Ludum Dare 46, the theme was Keep it alive. I took the theme too literally, so you have to keep IT alive!

 Ludum Dare 46 is my first attempt to make my very own solo project. I tried coding for the first time. Even though Audio is my field, I wanted to dare and experiment, so I focused on everything but audio!
